name: Ted The Time Teddy
description:
Ted the Time Teddy is a game made for Mini Jam under the Theme: Lost

Ted got left behind by his owner and needs to escape the "Forgotten Realm", a place where lost objects dwell until they are found.

Help Ted to get back to his owner, before he becomes part of the forgotten realm, but beware! Many of the beings in this dark place try to keep him there.

The player has the option to decide how he wants to spend the limited time he has for each level. He can trade time for speed, dashes and other abilities.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Jump: Space

Attack: Left Mouse Button

Dash: Shift

There are still a lot of things we wanted to include in this project, so we will add extra content in the future! A little trick for the speedrunner: you can jumpcancel with the attack if done correctly, to get another jump (or even two with the double jump ability!)

This project was created in three days by:
